amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute provides for the consideration of H.R. 2488, the Financial Freedom Act of 1999.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide for consideration of H.R. 2488 and specify that the amendment recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means now printed in the bill, modified by the amendments printed in section 3 of this resolution shall be considered as adopted.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Pryce (OH).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pryce (OH) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
